overview: Toby Merck is betrayed by the police while double-crossing the mob. They're killing everyone she loves and she's next. But when she starts to fight back, she is betrayed by her beautiful young lover--the daughter of a notorious drug lord. Now Toby has none to trust, nowhere to run, and nowhere to hide.
tagline: She lied to the police... and lied to the mob....Now, she knows their secrets.
title: The Last Lie
